com.mlt.desktop

Class OptionWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.OptionWindow

  • public class OptionWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    A frame or dialog that has the following properties.
    • Can have an option pane.
    • The layout is a border layout. Components may be set top, left, bottom, right and center.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • getOptionPane

        public OptionPane getOptionPane()
        Give access to the options pane to manage, add or remove options. Note that the option pane must have been set with a call to setOptions.... Throws a NullPointerException if the option pane has not been set.
        Returns:
        The option pane.
